game_info.name: Zero Sievert Clone
game_info.description: Top-down extraction shooter in post-apocalyptic wasteland. WASD movement, mouse aim, explore procedural zones, kill enemies, loot containers, reach extraction point.

core_loop.description: Spawn in zone -> Explore and loot -> Kill enemies -> Find and reach extraction point -> Return with loot. Death means losing gear.

primary_action.description: Mouse aims weapon, click to fire

combat_profile.how_to_attack: Move mouse to aim, left click to fire. Bullets have travel time. Reload with R.
combat_profile.enemy_approach: Enemies patrol, alert on sight, chase and shoot

key_features.name: Mouse Aim Combat
key_features.test_method: Move mouse, click to shoot in that direction

key_features.name: Enemy AI
key_features.test_method: Enemies patrol, detect player, chase and shoot

key_features.name: Extraction Point
key_features.test_method: Green extraction zone, stand in it for 3 seconds to extract

key_features.name: Health System
key_features.test_method: Taking damage reduces HP, death at 0

key_features.name: Reload System
key_features.test_method: Magazine depletes, R to reload, reload time

key_features.name: Loot Containers
key_features.test_method: Press E near container to loot
